name: Ironbound Oath
description: Passive (Defense): allied attack or any troops with 2 or less base defense gain +1.

name: Falconerâ€™s Call
description: Active (once per match, your turn): add 1 Falcon to your hand. Does not end your turn.

name: Giantslayer
description: Constant: the single highest-point enemy troop is reduced by half (rounded down).

name: War Drums
description: Passive (Attack): allied defense or any troops with 2 or less base attack gain +1.

name: Shieldwall Breaker
description: Constant: all enemy units in this row lose 1 point.

name: Meadhall Oath
description: On deploy: allied Mead units gain +1 per Mead on your board.

name: Predator Tally
description: On deploy: this unit gains +1 per enemy in this row.

name: Ward of the Few
description: On deploy: allied units in this row with 3 or less gain +2.

name: Reaper Decree
description: On deploy: enemy units in this row with 3 or more lose 2.

name: Runeband Pulse
description: On deploy: row gains +1 per unit in this row.

name: Eldritch Rhythm
description: Constant: row gains +1 per unit in this row.

name: Withering Hex
description: Constant: all enemy units in this row lose 1 point.

name: Crippling Curse
description: On deploy: all enemy units in this row lose 2 points.

name: Call the Veterans
description: On deploy: add 1 random card from the Horror or Mercenary tribe to your hand.

name: Aegis Line
description: Constant: allied units in this row ignore up to 1 point of enemy negative effects.
